content.html: (4/6) Not only was I asked to share my family plans (extremely inappropriate), when I needed maternity leave, I was told that it wasn't planned for in the CNCF budget. It's easy to talk diversity and inclusion. Hard to follow through when it affects your budget.
content.value:
(4/6) Not only was I asked to share my family plans (extremely inappropriate), when I needed maternity leave, I was told that it wasn't planned for in the CNCF budget.

It's easy to talk diversity and inclusion. Hard to follow through when it affects your budget.
